ops.label: Retrieve Value
ops.tip: Look up a single data point.

ops.label: Filter
ops.tip: Select data points that meet conditions.

ops.label: Find Extremum
ops.tip: Find the maximum or minimum value.

ops.label: Determine Range
ops.tip: Difference between max and min values.

ops.label: Difference
ops.tip: Subtract one value or group from another.

ops.label: Nth
ops.tip: Pick the 1st/2nd/3rd (or Nth) item after sorting.

ops.label: Count
ops.tip: Count the number of items that meet a condition.
